Posts.Content: Jul 23, 2012 06:56PM kishana wrote: Hi Autism Mom, Your symptoms are eerily similar to mine,including the disappearing aerola. I had a mammogram and ultrasound that came back negative. Posts.Title: Got a problem...how long can I wait? autism_mom Paintingmywaythru

Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2012 03:47AM kishana wrote: Autism mom, I have had my symptoms since about January.Usually IBC is only in one breast but if it metasisizes quickly it could go to the other breast. Wouldn't you think. I do not have a gyn but I went to the breast center at the hospital for the mammo and ultra but when they came back negative it seemed they were done with me. I went back to my GP, and he is the one who ordered the MRI. His office is extremely inefficient though. I called the office and asked if he could speed things up. I don't know if he can do anything. I live in Ontario and we have long MRI wait times. Maybe it isn't IBC but the symptoms are certainly that of. I just want to know what it is. I am sure you feel the same way, and if you are anything like me really worried. kishana

Posts.Content: kishana wrote: My doc said he sent the req in for an MRI, but he didn't tell me it took him two weeks.(or maybe it was his staff) I was going to give it two weeks and if the hospital hadn't called me by then with an appt I was going to call them. Then I got a nasty bacterial infection and had to deal with that for about two weeks.I then called the hospital to see about an appt and they told me they didn't have a req for me. So I called the doc's office and their records showed that they had sent it in on July 25th. I called the hospital back and they said that they still didn't have one but to have the doc's office send a second req. So I called the doc's back and gave them the fax number and they said they would send it right out. So I waited a day and called hospital back,they said they didn't have it. called doc back and they said it had been sent. GO FIGURE??? Talked again to a girl at the hospital and she said to have them send it again along with report of mammo and ultra, and ATTENTN her name. So I willl do that Mon.Can u believe this!!!kishana Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: kishana wrote: I have been having symptoms since Jan. It started as white discolouration of my breasts and real tenderness. Then a couple of months later I started seeing some pink/red marks on right breast. Then suddenly my breasts got bigger,especially the right one. Then some bruising, and change in texture,and part of the aerola seems to be disappearing. I had a mammo and ultra and came back neg but I know that don't usually detect it. I don't know what to think. What else could it be? I have been waiting a long time to get an appt for a MRI. Can anyone help? kishana Log in to post a reply
